Original: i find that despite the fact that i feel like i really liked this book i certainly read through the entire thing like i had a physical need to find out what happens next i cant think of anything to say about it;love

Casual: Even though I really liked this book and felt like I had to read it to see what happened, I'm having a hard time figuring out what to say about it.
